323500.name: PAYDAY 2: Hotline Miami
323500.description:
Do you like hurting other people?

The Hotline Miami DLC is the eleventh DLC pack for PAYDAY 2 and is a collaboration between Dennaton Games and OVERKILL.

Enjoy an all-new heist, five new melee weapons, three new submachine guns, a ton of mods and eight new masks, patterns and materials - all of it inspired from Hotline Miami.

Key Features


• An all-new heist – The dentist's long-term plans require leverage over Washington's District Attorney. The hotline to him goes through a Russian, known as the Commissar, operating out of Miami. Your job is to eliminate this Russian. Draw him out by sabotaging his operations in D.C.


• An awesome collaboration – OVERKILL and Dennaton Games, two independent studios, bring you an awesome collaboration. Items marked by the red Hotline Miami logo in this update can only be unlocked if you own the game Hotline Miami on Steam.


• 8 new weapons – Five new melee weapons including the mysterious 50 Blessings Briefcase and three new submachine guns including the classic Uzi.


• 8 new masks – Richard, Rasmus, Don Juan and their merry gang of killers are invading PAYDAY 2. Unlock four masks through this DLC and four masks by owning the Hotline Miami game on Steam.


• 8 new patterns – 8 new patterns inspired by everyone's favorite time - the 80's! Unlock four patterns through this DLC and four patterns by owning the Hotline Miami game on Steam.


• 8 materials – As if a ton of patterns weren't enough, here's another 8 materials to quench your thirst for everything retro. Unlock four materials through this DLC and four materials by owning the Hotline Miami game on Steam.


• 7 achievements – 7 achievements have been added, with many of them giving you in-game items as rewards. Grab them all!
